front.title: Framework and Data Model for OTN Network Slicing

abstract.t: The requirement of slicing network resource with desired quality of service is emerging at every network technology, including the Optical Transport Networks (OTN). As a part of the transport network, the OTN has the capability to provide hard pipes with guaranteed data isolation and deterministic low latency, which are highly demanded in the Service Level Agreement (SLA). This document describes a framework for OTN network slicing. A YANG data model augmentation will be defined in a future version of this draft.
